name: John Ridding
text: . @robertrichman on culture: it already exists and will move on without you. Be open and create space for culture to happen #pearsonsummit

name: John Ridding
text: You can't create culture. It's like energy - already there. So the question is, how to shift it? - @robertrichman #pearsonsummit
